title: Shopify Website Development for E-Commerce Store
description:
We are seeking a skilled Shopify developer to create a fully functional e-commerce website. The project involves designing and building 9 distinct pages tailored to our brand's needs. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Shopify’s platform, excellent design skills, and the ability to integrate payment gateways. Your expertise will help us create an attractive and user-friendly online store that enhances the shopping experience for our customers. If you are passionate about e-commerce and have a portfolio of successful Shopify projects, we want to hear from you!

Scope includes:
•⁠  ⁠Home page 
•⁠  ⁠About 
•⁠  ⁠Shop page - layout showcasing all 4 products;
•⁠  ⁠Product Details page - on layout design for all products;
•⁠  ⁠Cart & Checkout
•⁠  ⁠Contact Us
•⁠  ⁠Blog listing 
•⁠  ⁠Blog post page
•⁠  ⁠Terms of Use & Privacy Policy
skills: Shopify, Shopify Templates, Web Development, WooCommerce, Ecommerce Website Development
